name: Death Gas
description: This heavy black gas causes the target’s body to shut down by causing a Death Gas Toxin effect.

name: Assassination Poison
description: Imbiber suffers the assassinate effect immediately

name: Life Elixir
description: Hailed as the pinnacle of the Alchemist’s craft  this potion restores Life into the target (Life to Living).

name: Maythen Essence
description: Perfectly identifies all component slots in a recipe

name: Panacea Elixer
description: Instantly heals five points of damage.

name: Magic Suppression Poison
description: Imbiber is unable to use Magic Skills or cast spells for ten minutes.

name: Amplify Healing
description: This potion increases the effectiveness of spells cast by imbiber that use the Heal Living effect for ten minutes. Each spell heals 1 extra point.

name: Arcane Projection
effect: Bestow Line of Voice for spell within 10 minutes
description: A single spell may be cast by voice  must be cast within ten minutes of imbibing.

name: Weakeness Gas  Improved
description: Weaken Gas saps all Strength out of the target  causing a Weakness Gas Toxin effect.

name: Weakeness Gas
description: Weaken Gas saps all Strength out of the target  causing a Lv 2 Weakness Gas Toxin effect.

name: Adrenaline Surge Elixir
description: The imbiber of this potion is granted great vigor and strength  putting them into an Adrenaline Surge  per the skill.

name: Elven Restoration
description: Instantly heals 3 point of damage and restores 1 AP  only affects elves. (3 Heal Elf  Restore 1 AP to Elf)

name: Debilitating Poison
description: A thick and very sweet green liquid that causes the imbiber's body to seize  caused by a Level 2 Paralysis Toxin effect for ten minutes.

name: Strong Poison
description: Instantly deals five points of damage (5 Body Toxin)

name: Draught of Death
description: This potion doubles effectiveness of spells that use the Heal Undead and Harm Living effects for ten minutes. Drinking this causes 5 Harm Living Toxin to the imbiber.

name: Sleep Gas
description: Causes the target to be affected by a Level 1 Sleep Gas Toxin effect.

name: Disarming Gas
description: Target briefly loses the strength to hold objects. Packet Delivered call "Disarm both hands Gas Toxin"

name: Gleaming Essence
description: requires Mystic blood  used as a component

name: Fatal Poison
description: The imbiber of this potion immediately suffers a level 3 fatal toxin effect

name: Fatal Potion
description: Ingested level 2 fatal toxin

name: Flesh Rot Gas
description: Flesh Rot gas eats away at living flesh dealing one point of the Harm Living Toxin effect.

name: Increased Animation Potion
description: After this tincture is imbibed the drinker may throw one additional packet each time they cast raise dead.

name: Mortal Blade Grease
description: When applied to a weapon  the next two strikes are called "Mortal Toxin" (if not used within 1 hour the effect wears off)

name: Mortal Gas Toxin
description: Packet Deliver "Mortal Gas Toxin"

name: Fire Absorption Grease
effect: Bestow Reduce Fire next 3 points of damage
description: Prevents the next three points of fire damage to the user. Lasts one hour.

name: Stunning Gas
description: Stunning gas temporarily shocks the nervous system of the target  causing a Stun Gas Toxin effect.

name: Mend Armor Glue
description: This thick glue repairs a piece of armor to full armor points. Requires five minutes to apply.

name: Cure Disease
description: Cures the disease effect  any level

name: Resist Gas Potion
description: Grants the drinker the ability to resist the next "gas" that effects them. Lasts ten minutes

name: Regeneration Potion
description: Once imbibed the drinker will heal 1 point of body per minute for 5 minutes. If the drinker takes damage during this time the effect ends immediately.

name: Death by Moonlight
description: When this strange potion is ingested under the light of the moon the imbiber immediately suffers the “Fatal Toxin” effect. If the potion is ingested at any other time there is no effect.

name: Potion of Mortality
description: When ingested the drinker immediately suffers a level 2 mortal effect.

name: Spirit Anointing Salve
description: Prepares the spirit for Death - Bestow (minor death boon)

name: Awaken Potion
description: Immediately awakens the target from any sleep or coma effect.

name: Heal Living Potion
description: Instantly heals three points of damage (3 Heal Living).

name: Heal Undead Potion
description: Instantly heals three points of damage to undead

name: Healing Salve
description: Instantly heals one point of damage (1 Heal).

name: Palliative Potion
effect: "Diagnose are you maimed? If yes 3 healing  if no 1 healing"
description: if imbiber is suffering from a maimed limb  they heal 3hp  otherwise they heal 1 hp

name: Regenerative Healing
description: Heal one point every minute while sitting or laying down. Lasts 10 minutes.

name: Restore Flesh Gas
description: Restore Flesh gas eats away at undead flesh dealing one point of a Harm Undead Toxin effect.

name: Crop Witherer
description: When spread over a garden it will cut the next yield in half (plants affected are determined at random)

name: Sleep Gas (alternate)
description: Sleep Gas Toxin lv 1 1 minute

name: Flaming Grease
description: when applied to a weapon the next 3 swings are “3 Fire” (if not used within 1 hour the effect wears off)

name: Inner Flame
description: Spells cast by imbiber that deal Fire-damage deal an additional two points per packet for ten minutes. Each packet thrown deals one damage to caster  cannot be resisted or healed until effect ends.

name: Potion of Farsight
description: Within one week of imbibing this potion the drinker will fall into a trance and receive visions. Drinkers report sometimes seeing visions of the future  or events happening far away. (This vision will be delivered in timeblocks)

name: Inert Alchemical Substance 4
description: Inert Substance

name: Fire Cloud
description: Fire Cloud is an explosive gas cloud that deals one points of Fire Gas damage to the target.

name: Berserk Potion
description: The imbiber immediately suffers the bereserk effet for 10 minutes

name: Imititation Undeath Extract
description: When imbibed the drinker is treated as though they were undead for all healing and harm effects for 10 minutest. (If the drinker is living  they are no longer effected by heal/harm living)

name: Rage Gas(experiment)
description: Causes Berserk Effect

name: Adhesive Remover
description: Dissolves adhesives

name: Endurance Potion
description: The imbiber of this potion gains use of the Fortitude skill until the end of the next reset ( resist Stun or Waylay for 1ap)

name: Toxin Protection Dust
description: This grants a single level 1 toxin sheild which must be usedwithin 1 hour.

name: Shatter Grease
description: Shatter Oil is a highly corrosive gel that when carefully applied to a weapon it causes the next strike to call for the Shatter Toxin effect. Requires one minute to apply. (if not used within 1 hour the effect wears off)

name: Wither Limb Grease
effect: Bestow "Maim toxin lv2 on next strike"
description: This blade toxin poisons an edged weapon to cause numbness and pain  adding the Maim Toxin effect on the next strike.

name: Laughing Gas
effect: RP Laughing Gas Toxin Lv1 30 seconds
description: Laughing gas is a light  heady gas that causes euphoria for one minute (Call: RP Laughing Toxin  30 seconds).

name: Potion of Truth
description: The imbiber of this potion believes everything he says is true for the next ten minues. (This allows the character to answer questions falsely if dominated  though not if controlled. Character must still comply with all other dominate commands as normal.)

name: Acid Gas
description: Packet attack that deals three points of Acid Gas damage to the target.

name: Acid Protection Salve
effect: "Reduce" acid damage by 1 for ten minutes
description: Allows character to reduce attacks with Acid damage type to 1 damage  for ten minutes.

name: Metal Weakening Salve
description: When applied to a metal item (Armor  weapon  other) the next strike that hits said item is treated as a "destroy"

name: Energy Shake
description: An Energy Shake invigorates the imbiber  temporarily granting one ability point which last for pne hour. Until the ability point is used the imbiber must RP extreme aggitation

name: Magic Shielding Salve
effect: "Bestow 2 magic shields  must be used on next to magic effects"
description: Grants target 2 Magic Shields which must be used on the next 2 Magic effects to strike them. Lasts until end of the current reset.

name: Salve of Magical Protection
description: This salve grants the recipient a magic shield. The recipient may choose when to activate the shield. Lasts until the end of the next reset

name: Agile Regeneration Potion
description: The imbiber regenerates 1 body point per minute for 5 minutes. The effect ends if the user stops moving within those 10 minutes. No other skills can be used during this time (See: Heal Self skill- except constant motion)

name: Fear Gas
effect: RP Fear Gas Toxin lv1 30 seconds
description: Causes the target to suffer the RP Fear (30 seconds) effect. Call "RP Fear Gas Toxin 30 seconds)"

name: Potion of Avoidance
effect: Bestow "Dodge on next attack not from behind"
description: The imbiber of this potion calls "Avoid" on the next weapon or packet attack which hits them as long as it is not delivered from behind.

name: Poison Protection Salve
description: RESIST a single Level 1 Toxin.

name: Body Stabilization Potion
effect: Bestow "One Body Stablization" lasts until end of reset
description: The imbiber gains the ability to use the Body Stabilization skill once  until end of next reset.

name: Resurgence Potion
description: Removes three minutes from the imbiber's current exhaustion time. (Only effects Krosan)

name: Krosan Restoration
description: Instantly heals 3 points of damage and restores 1 AP  only affects Krosan. (3 Heal Krosan  Restore 1 AP to Krosan)

name: Mimic Toxin
description: Imbiber mimics speech and mundane actions of those around them for ten minutes

name: Snake Venom
description: Identifies base usage of Grade 1 & 2 components

name: Intermediate Poison
description: Instantly deals three points of damage (3 Body Toxin)

name: Armorsmith's Acuity
description: Increases armor points repaired per repair action by 1 point for 1 hour.

name: Tranquil Mind Potion
description: Imbiber instantly the Tranquil Mind effect

name: Explosive Grease
effect: Bestow next swing "Area of Effect 5 feet  2 fire"
description: When this oil is applied to a weapon it causes the next strike to deal fire damage to the surrounding area. Next strike call "Area of Effect 5 feet  2 fire)

name: Terrible Smelling Bad Formula
description: When this combination is attempted it immediately explodes covering the 5' area around it in sticky goo (Made as example of useless IG combination)

name: Silence Gas
description: Silence Gas renders the target unable to form words for 1 minute. Packet delivered "Silence Gas Toxin"

name: Methal Acid
description: Perfectly identifies properties of Grade 1 & 2 components.

name: Anti-Destruction Grease
description: When applied to a weapon  armor  or a shield the item resists the next "Destroy" effect. Lasts until the end of the next reset

name: Potion of Foresight
description: When imbibed the drinker must spend a day concentrating on a quesiton or event and then a day in quiet meditation. They will recieve a vision related to topic they meditated on. (This vision will be delivered in timeblocks)

name: Adaptive Tincture
description: When imbibed the drinker of this tincture loses 1 BP and immediately gains 1 resettable AP until the end of the next reset. The drinker’s MAX BP is also reduced by 1 until the end of the next reset.

name: Adaptive Tincture Alt
description: When imbibed the drinker of this tincture loses 1 BP and immediately gains 1 resettable AP until the end of the next reset. The drinker’s MAX BP is also reduced by 1 until the end of the next reset.

name: Agaric Essence
description: Used in other recipes

name: Agile Tincture
description: The imbiber of this tincture may reduce the next physical attack which strikes them by 1. Call "Reduced" when struck with a weapon and take 1 less point of damage. This cannot be stacked with other damage reduction

name: Anti-Choking Ointment
description: When spread on the throat this salve prevents the user from being choked for the next 10 minutes. Call No Effect to any Choke effect during that timeframe

name: Anti-Glibben Perfume
description: When sprayed onto someone they immediately make the following call "Disengage Glibben 10 feet - 1 minute on me".

name: Battle Oil
description: When applied to a weapon the next strike deals 1 additional point of damage. Takes 1 minute to apply. (if not used within 1 hour the effect wears off)

name: Bloodworm Tincture (experiment)
description: Imbiber loses one maximum Body point for a single reset  cannot decrease below one body.

name: Body Poison Tincture
description: Instantly deals one point of body damage

name: Cleansing Ointment
description: This salve when applied to a diseased target will cure a level 1 disease after 1 minute "Cure Disease"

name: Corrupting Tincture
description: When imbibed the drinker immidately suffers the disease toxin effect for 1 hour.

name: Crop Strengthening Spray
description: This spray will help protect crops from parasitic infection. Spraying this on a plant will greatly reduce the risk of damage to the plant.

name: Cyra Sap
description: Used in other recipes

name: Deadly Tincture
description: When ingested this tincture causes the Mortal effect"

name: Ear of the Divine
description: Increases chances that a specific prayer is heard. User drinks the tincture then recites their prayer. (This requires a marshall to use)

name: Enraging Blade Oil
effect: Bestow "Berserk Toxin lv1 on next swing"
description: The target of a blade coated with this substance becomes enraged and under a Level 1 Berserk Toxin effect.

name: Fire Oil
effect: Bestow "+1 Fire damage on next swing"
description: When applied to a weapon the next swing deals an additional point of fire damage. (if not used within 1 hour the effect wears off)

name: Fire Prevention Salve
effect: Bestow " Reduce next fire damage by 3" call "Reduced"
description:
Once spread onto a person or creature they may reduce the next fire damage which hits them by 3 points (salve is used regardless of total damage i.e 3 damage would still use up the salve).
 The Salve lasts until used or the end of the next reset

name: Flame Blade Oil
effect: Bestow "+1 Fire damage on next swing"
description: When applied to a weapon  this sticky oil explodes violently on the next swing  adding one extra point of damage in addition to the Fire effect (if not used within 1 hour the effect wears off)

name: Growth Spray
description: When sprinkled on a seed it will increase the rate at which the plant grows. (Will only work on grade 1 plants)

name: Heal Living Tincture
description: Instantly heals one point of damage (1 Heal Living).

name: Heal Undead Tincture
description: Instantly heals one point of damage (1 Heal Undead).

name: Healing Prevention Tincture
description: When imbibed the drinker cannot be healed by alchemical means until the end of the next reset

name: Horac's Essence
description: Horac’s Essence empowers the imbiber with Strength for up to five minutes. This has no effect if the imbiber already has Strength.

name: Hyacinth Nectar
description: Used in other recipes

name: Hydrogen Atheleck
description: Used in other recipes

name: Improve Resistance Tincture
description: When ingested the drinker may resist one additional elemental attack when an elemental shield is cast on them

name: Improve Toxin Resistance Tincture
description: This tincture will cause the next use of Resist Toxin to cost 1 AP less than normal to a minimum of 1ap (i.e resist level 1 or 2 effect for 1 AP  level 3 effect for 2ap).

name: Inert Alchemical Substance
description: Concentration of flint creates an innert alchemical substance.

name: Inert Alchemical Substance 2
description: Concentration of Fly is only useful in journeyman recipies involving diseases/sickness

name: Inert Alchemical Substance 3
description: Extraction of flint creates an innert alchemical substance.

name: Inert Alchemical Substance 5
description: There is no alchemical substance created.

name: Irritation Salve
description: This salve will cause the target to RP Itchiness for 1 minute

name: Lightning Protection Salve
effect: Bestow " Reduce next lightning damage by 3" call "Reduced"
description:
Once spread onto a person or creature they may reduce the next lightning damage which hits them by 3 points (salve is used regardless of total damage i.e 3 damage would still use up the salve).
 The Salve lasts until used or the end of the next reset

name: Mend Limb Tincture
description: This strange decoction removes all Maim effects from the imbiber. The effect has an onset time of one minutes  at the end of which the imbiber is also dealt two points of Body Toxin damage.

name: Mercury
description: Used to break down alchemy substances for research

name: Minor Harming Oil
description: The target of a blade coated with this substance takes the damage directly to their body .(if not used within 1 hour the effect wears off)

name: Multiplication Salve
effect: Bestow Malady "Next leveled effect to strike target has level increased by 1"
description: After applying this salve  the next leveled effect to strike the target has it's level increased by 1 to a maximum of 3. Effect lasts until1 hour.

name: Nauseating Tincture
description: The imbiber of this tincture immediately suffers "RP Nausea Toxin 1 minute "

name: Newt Acid
description: Identifies all "dummy" component slots in a recipe.

name: Palliative Tincture
description: if imbiber is suffering from a maimed limb  they heal 1hp  otherwise there is no effect

name: Paralysis Poison
description: Causes the imbiber to be affected by a Level 1 Paralysis Toxin effect.

name: Persil Liquid
description: Used to break down alchemy substances for research

name: Poison Neutralization Powder
effect: "Remove lv 1 toxin  poison or disease from plate of food or single drink"
description: A fine green powder when sprinkled upon foods or mixed into a beverage  will neutralize toxins per the Purify Food and Drink spell.

name: Protective Salve
description: This salve protects the user against one point of damage from the next weapon to strike them call "Reduced" and take 1 less damage to a minumum of 0

name: Putrifying Salve
description: This salve when applied to a living target will cause a level 1 disease after 1 minutes "Disease Toxin"

name: Radix Liquid
description: Used in other recipes

name: Repair Glue
description: This thick glue repairs a Shattered item. Requires three minutes to apply.

name: Restorative Salve
description: When applied to a maimed limb the limb becomes usable again after one minute. Takes ten seconds to apply.

name: Sleeping Tincture
description: Instantly causes the imbiber to be affected by a Level 1 Sleep Toxin effect for five minutes.

name: Slowing Salve
description: When applied to living creature this causes the Slow effect for one minute  takes one minute to apply.

name: Smelling Salts
description: Smelling Salts allow the user to rouse a sleeping or unconscious person  removing the Sleep effect.

name: Tincture of The Impossible
description: Causes the imbiber to RP having hallucinations for 5 minutes

name: Tincture of Vulnerability
description: Causes the imbiber to RP emotional instability for 5 minutes.

name: Toxic Tincture
description: When imbibed the drinker immidately suffers the nasuea toxin effect for 5 minutes.

name: Tranquil Mind Tincture
description: Removes Berserk  any RP (emotion) and induces RP (calm) 10 second onset

name: Wayfinding Tincture
description: Gain one use of the Troubleshooting Skill to be used within one hour (You do not need to have the skill  or spend AP)

name: Weakening Oil
effect: Bestow Malady "After 5 minutes next strike on this item is a shatter"
description: When spread onto metal object this oil weakens the metal. After 5 minutes the next blow that strikes the object is treated as a “Shatter”
